result.title: System requirements and performance indicators
result.description: Specifications and requirements of the CROWD4ROADS platform at all stages of its development, from a simple interaction between independent grassroots initiatives, up to a full-fledged integrated platform with advanced support for gamification and monetization. Operative definitions of the key performance indicators to be used for validation, assessment, and evaluation.
